description:
UPDATE: Course Updated For February 2015

If you're like me, you are an artist first and don't like the business part of it. But you know how important it is to fund your dream job.

If you take this course, you can learn how to make money doing the thing you love: taking pictures and/or making videos - just like me!

Learn from my mistakes. Invest in yourself.

If you're looking for "instant easy get rich quick" scheme, don't take this course. You will have to actually follow the advice in this course to have a chance at being successful with your dream business.

There is no guarantee for your success but you can learn from my mistakes and our best practices so you don’t have to pay for your own mistakes.

NEW! Now includes resource guides!

+++++++++++++++++++++++

About this course:

  • Based on actual experience and our actual fully functional studio
  • Full, free lifetime access
  • Includes regular office hours to ask questions!
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee!
  • Now includes resource guide - access instantly!

SEE HOW WE EARN:

  • Over $3,000 a week taking pictures and making videos

.... all on average month after month, after month!

Today, you can start to make good money with your photography and videography!

Take a peek into our studio and how we run a six figure photo and video business.

Whether you are starting a photography or videography business or have been struggling for years, this class is for you.

You'll learn:

  1. About me and my varied experience that help me build this successful business
  2. What to think about before starting your photo or video business
  3. How to gain more freedom and flexibility with a true business instead of running around doing everything
  4. One simple mindset trick that helps you succeed
  5. The prerequisite to succeed in the photo and video business
  6. The pitfalls and tips to build a great team
  7. How ARTISTS help make the world better and make money doing it
  8. How to set your prices.
  9. How to choose your business structure for your protection
  10. Bringing in employees or contractors
  11. Pros and cons of working from home, renting a studio, or sharing a space,
  12. Should you buy or rent gear?
  13. Controlling your expenses
  14. The power of cash flow
  15. Free yourself to do more Fun Stuff
  16. What tools and systems we use to run our business.
  17. How to handle the Accounting and the other things you hate
  18. Marketing and Sales tips
  19. Financial tools tips
  20. Accident and theft protection for very little money
  21. Five Laws that can shape your business
  22. Ideas and philosophy to help you succeed

... and more!

Click the "take this course" button, top right, now ...

Don’t struggle …

Learn from my experience and mistakes.

Invest in yourself and invest in your business.

Do it right the first time.

I am committed to your success. I want you to succeed. If you succeed, we all win. Plus, my name is on this. I don't want to be embarrassed by putting out bad information.

Sincerely,

-Jeff Orig

P.S. This is less than the cost of a lens but you can make many times that amount with this knowledge.

P.P.S. Don't forget the money back guarantee! Give it a try, I think you'll be happy you did.
title: How to Start Your Own Business by Taking Photos & Videos
